talk.author: did:plc:ul5etilu6cjfmuy3uigz5dfp
talk.utter:
Hello everyone.. Hanukkah is concluded, New Years too...

The dreaded Shiva has concluded as well..

I wish everyone had a great Holiday with family, friends, and loved ones.

talk.author: did:plc:d6srqnzqovlnqznjalzfb7ni
talk.utter: Darby, so glad to see you back. I was worried about you!!  I hope you know that you have friends here as well as in the real world!

talk.author: did:plc:ul5etilu6cjfmuy3uigz5dfp
talk.utter: I appreciate you..

talk.author: did:plc:ul5etilu6cjfmuy3uigz5dfp
talk.utter: I appreciate you..

talk.author: did:plc:d6srqnzqovlnqznjalzfb7ni
talk.utter: I appreciate YOU!

talk.author: did:plc:ul5etilu6cjfmuy3uigz5dfp
talk.utter: I do have some twisted thoughts...

talk.author: did:plc:ul5etilu6cjfmuy3uigz5dfp
talk.utter: I do have some twisted thoughts...

talk.author: did:plc:d6srqnzqovlnqznjalzfb7ni
talk.utter: Dont we all? That's why we converse...

talk.author: did:plc:ul5etilu6cjfmuy3uigz5dfp
talk.utter:
Remember, not all who wonder are lost..

Trial prep was excellent in creating mind multitasking.. or as I've said, mental "master baiting"..

Some psychologists say it's impossible to have competing thoughts at the same time..

Because of trial prep, court, and trial..

talk.utter: Are you a lawyer?

talk.author: did:plc:ul5etilu6cjfmuy3uigz5dfp
talk.utter: I retired the year after my son died..

talk.author: did:plc:ul5etilu6cjfmuy3uigz5dfp
talk.utter: I retired the year after my son died..

talk.author: did:plc:d6srqnzqovlnqznjalzfb7ni
talk.utter: Oh my. I'm sorry, the loss of a child is the worst. I know. I also lost a child. Life is not fair.

talk.author: did:plc:ul5etilu6cjfmuy3uigz5dfp
talk.utter:
I was in suicide mode.. but for my overworked guardian angel actions, I'd been successful..

PM the next part..

talk.utter: Retired.. One secretary said I was evil.. I'm not paid to lose was my reply..
